greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Matrix product of unsigned Lah-triangle |A008297(n,k)| and Stirling2-triangle A008277(n,k).
comment: Also the Bell transform of A000262(n+1). For the definition of the Bell transform see A264428. - _Peter Luschny_, Jan 26 2016
maple: # The function BellMatrix is defined in A264428.
mathematica: BellMatrix[f_, len_] := With[{t = Array[f, len, 0]}, Table[BellY[n, k, t], {n, 0, len - 1}, {k, 0, len - 1}]];
B = BellMatrix[Function[n, Sum[BellY[n+1, k, Range[n+1]!], {k, 0, n+1}]], rows];
Table[B[[n, k]], {n, 2, rows}, {k, 2, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 28 2018, after Peter Luschny_ *)
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 22 2003
